body:
I have found just a few bugs in version 20b:

-Albino Troll seems to ask for only one mana (G) instead of (1)(G) for both Echo and Regeneration abilities
-Unlike for previous version, Recurring Nightmare could not be activated at all.
-Gemstone Mine does not seem to loose counters when tapped for mana
-I confirm the already mentined bug with Joraga Warcaller

PS: Given the fact how few bugs there are in Magarena, I need to express my respect to the development team. Great job guys!!

Arten

title: Defect

comments.body:
Thanks for the report.

- The bug with echo costs has been fixed. See issue 106 for details.
- I can't reproduce the regeneration bug you describe. Maybe it's caused by some interaction with other cards/effects. Please file a new report with any details about which cards were in play etc., when you ever see the bug happening again.
- I had no problem using Recurring Nightmare's ability. It does require you to have another creature in play and can only be played as a sorcery, so maybe the problem lies there?
- The bug with Gemstone Mine was fixed a few days ago. See issue 104 .
- The bug with Joraga Warcaller (and other cards) has been fixed too. See issue 105 .

Feel free to open a new report for any bug you think is not resolved and please make a separate issue for each bug you find, it's much cleaner that way.

Thanks for the kind words too :D

**Status:** Fixed
